BasicDescription.Title: Click
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Ebooks. Are ebooks ready to go mainstream? Richard Taylor heads to Japan to see how ebooks are taking off on mobile phones. Includes news and web reviews.

Ebooks
Spencer Kelly looks into whether a concept which has been around for 15 years is finally ready to go mainstream, whilst Richard Taylor heads to Japan to see how ebooks are already taking off on mobile phones. Includes news and web reviews.
